title: Un Monde Sans Pitie
description:
I rented this film over 20 years ago and it stayed in my head all these years. 

Sadly, I could only find a used VHS copy with hard-coded yellow subtitles. Quality is sub par as it was transferred to dvd-r before being encoded with Handbrake to mp4. I found a French dvd on ebay but it contained no subtitles at all! 

If anyone has a link for a subs file I will gladly encode the superior dvd version and sync accordingly. 

Not perfect but still watchable for those who don't speak French. C'est la vie...
